userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Use microfilm copy, Accomack County (Va.) Reel 52.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Accomack County (Va.) Will Books, 1673-1761. Local government records collection, Accomack County Court Records. The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Va. 23219.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This item came to the Library of Virginia in shipments of court papers from Accomack County.

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: Accomack County was formed in 1663 from Northampton County. Previous names for Accomack County were Accawmack, Accomac (original shire), Northampton (1643.)

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Will books, 1673-1761, of Accomack County Court. They include the name of testator, list of heirs, and the year the will was proven in court. They also include probate records such as inventories and appraisements.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Additional Accomack County Will Books can be found on microfilm at the Library of Virginia. Consult "A Guide to Virginia County and City Records on Microfilm" found on the Library of Virginia web site.

scopecontent.p: Does not have a microfilm copy.
